import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody, CardText, CardImg, CardTitle, CardSubtitle, Button, Container, Row, Col} from "reactstrap" import "./post.css" //Adding cards and specified by props coming from posts as a selector //Styling with reactstrap const Post = ({post, setCurrentId}) =>{ return (
{post.creator}
{post.title} {post.tags.map(tag => `#${tag} `)} {post.message}
) } export default Post
